title: Louisiana girl taken from school bus by 47-year-old male 'family friend' for 'love' odyssey: Report
itunes:title: Louisiana girl taken from school bus by 47-year-old male 'family friend' for 'love' odyssey: Report
description:
A 15-year-old Louisiana girl said to be “madly in love” with a family friend three times her age got off of her school bus and into his car. He drove her some 1,200 miles away to Colorado. The suspect reportedly lied about having a grandchild in an attempt to spend more time with the teen.

Nancy's expert panel weighs in:

Ashley Willcott: Juvenile Court Judge & Trial Attorney

Kathleen Murphy: Family attorney

John Cardillo: Former NYPD

Caryn Stark: Psychologist

Robyn Walensky: Crimeonline.com Investigative Reporter






Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
